programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Total DramaRama is canadian animated comedy series, spin-off of Total Drama, all characters are already well-known and loved by the audience. This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. Any harmless idea of the kids turns out to be a total disaster, they are irrepressible in producing new ideas on how to have fun. the kids are discussing every single decision and plan in front of the cameras just like their adult versions, being a part of a reality show.

programme.title: Bunnicula
programme.desc: Once upon a time an extraordinary bunny is born in an average family of bunnies. The little guy looks just like a vampire- he has sharp fangs, his ears remind of bat wings and plus he is scared of sunlight. Bunnicula is never out in daylight, sleeps in a coffin, flies with bat wings, and drains juice from vegetables with his fangs which gives him enormous power. His family is afraid that he will attack somebody so they lock him in an old mansion. Bunnicula has been sleeping for many years until a little girl Mina unlocks hims and makes him a new member of her family. Her dog named Harold makes friends with Bunnicula straight away but the cat Chester is a little bit scared of him and does not seem to be happy about a new pet.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. Any harmless idea of the kids turns out to be a total disaster, they are irrepressible in producing new ideas on how to have fun. the kids are discussing every single decision and plan in front of the cameras just like their adult versions, being a part of a reality show.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Anais starts aging prematurely due to the stress and pressure of looking out for the rest of her stupid family.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: After a deer knocks him unconscious and breaks his legs, Finn wakes up from 6 months sleep to find that the Candy Kingdom is deserted and Jake has gone insane from when he got hit in the head and thinks everyone is doing a surprise birthday party for him, then Finn hears candy people in sewers and tries to go down there but has to escape from Jake because he thinks its going the ruin the surprise.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The kids try to help Dad bond with Frankie. / When the uncomfortableness between them reaches new levels Gumball and Hot Dog Guy decide they have to confront their ongoing awkwardness by making things as awkward as possible. / The kids realise that theyve never known their neighbours name, and theyre way past the window where they can ask. / Gumball has something uncomfortable to tell Penny but doesnt know how, until he makes a deal with Principal Brown. / Gumball and Anais go head to head in a leadership election voted for by their classmates. / Clayton realises he can imitate his classmates, and begins stealing the lives of the people of Elmore. / When unexpected couples in the world of Elmore start randomly falling in love, Gumball and Darwin have to figure out whats going on. / Gumball questions Mr Smalls eco-friendly commitment, causing him to abandon society and live in the forest. Director: Mic Graves.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons discover a family of cartoon copycats who mimic their every move. / Grandpa Louie has a new online friend - the only problem is she isnt real. / The kids find out that Richard has been being picked on by the same person since high school. / Gumball and Darwin decide to use online reviews to wrangle free stuff. / A mysterious package shows up at the Wattersons house and they do their best to avoid opening it. / Darwin likes a girl in his class so Gumball decides its time to play cupid. / Gumballs smart answers arent the correct ones and hes forced to go back to kindergarten. / Gumball and Darwin discover the real reason Dads diet wasnt working. / Gumball discovers that Rob his old nemesis is neme-seeing someone else now.

Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin accidentally create a loveable monster that eats their family. / Anais arrives in the bedroom to find a messy crime-scene and her Daisy doll missing. She realises Gumball and Darwin are the chief suspects. / A mysterious figure from Nicoles past shows up and challenges her to a fight, but the kids are surprised when she refuses. / A compilation of some of the funniest, most bizarre clips uploaded onto the internet by the people of Elmore. / When Rob purchases a universal remote from the Awesome Store he discovers he can control the universe. He rewinds into the past and remembers Gumball had left him in The Void. / When we last saw Gumball he was hitting rewind on Robs Universal Remote just in time to save himself from being trapped in The Void. / Gumball and Darwin go to extreme lengths to help Molly make her dull stories more interesting. / Anais has made a new friend, so Gumball and Darwin immediately assume there must be something wrong with him. / Gumball and Darwin think its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. But as they walk around Elmore it appears exciting things are happening just not to them. 1

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin help Anais rescue her doll from Tina Rex. / Gumball and Darwin are unwitting accomplices in a gas station robbery. / Gumball and Darwin accidentally destroy Mr Robinsons new car… or do they? / Gumball experiences an impossibly unfortunate chain of events. / Gumball and Darwin accidentally create a loveable monster that eats their family. / Gumball is embarrassed when Mum comes to school to spend some "quality time". / Gumballs magic tinfoil helmet threatens to tear the Watterson family apart! / Anais is convinced that Gumball is being bullied by Tina Rex.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Colossus: Gumball and Darwin learn that it isnt wise to upset Hector Elmores resident Giant. / The Knights: Gumball and Tobias compete for Pennys affection by putting on the lamest duel in history. / The Remote: The Wattersons battle for possession of the TV remote gets dirty. / The Fridge: When Mom discovers Gumball has no ambition she is determined to turn him into a winner. / Gumball seeks justice when Banana Joe chews Darwins pen. / Gumball is determined to drive Penny away from Leslie / Darwin develops a texting addiction when he and Gumball get their first cell phone. / Richard gets a job as a pizza delivery man which worries Nicole when at the same time strange things begin to occur around the neighbourhood. / Gumball Darwin and Anais search for the Watterson family treasure.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The orange blob is down at the Museum, nerding out about ancient Egypt, when the Docs show up and ruin Lamputs day. Darn science geeks. No respect for culture. A superior knowledge of history keeps Lamput one step ahead of the blue boffins - how many times can two chemists get kicked out of the same Museum? The Docs sneak back into the exhibition disguised as mummies. They learn the hard way that a disguise can be TOO good; they get locked into a glass box overnight. Lucky break, though; this is the night when a renowned jewel thief tries to steal the museums precious treasures. Lamput and the Docs get tangled up in the heist. The rest is history.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are shocked to realise that their class isnt the only one in Elmore Junior High. / Dad discovers that Granny Jojo and Louie plan to get married and move to Florida. To stop this happening he adopts Louie so that he can forbid him from marrying Granny Jojo. / After they receive an extravagant invitation to Masamis birthday party Gumball and Darwin are anxious to find just the right gift for her. However theyre not the only ones. / Gumball sets out to prove to Pennys father that hes good enough for his daughter. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Grandpa Louie gives them a cheque, the Watterson kids argue over how to spend the money. / When they find Anais training herself for a brutal showdown Gumball and Darwin realise that their sister is being pestered at school by an annoying kid: Billy. / An impromptu hug with a stranger at school leaves Gumball in an increasingly awkward social situation. / Mom and the kids depart for their hard days work leaving a seemingly lazy Dad half-asleep on the sofa. Mom has given him one very simple job: buy mayonnaise. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Total DramaRama is canadian animated comedy series, spin-off of Total Drama, all characters are already well-known and loved by the audience. This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. Any harmless idea of the kids turns out to be a total disaster, they are irrepressible in producing new ideas on how to have fun. the kids are discussing every single decision and plan in front of the cameras just like their adult versions, being a part of a reality show.

Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Bunnicula
programme.desc: Once upon a time an extraordinary bunny is born in an average family of bunnies. The little guy looks just like a vampire- he has sharp fangs, his ears remind of bat wings and plus he is scared of sunlight. Bunnicula is never out in daylight, sleeps in a coffin, flies with bat wings, and drains juice from vegetables with his fangs which gives him enormous power. His family is afraid that he will attack somebody so they lock him in an old mansion. Bunnicula has been sleeping for many years until a little girl Mina unlocks hims and makes him a new member of her family. Her dog named Harold makes friends with Bunnicula straight away but the cat Chester is a little bit scared of him and does not seem to be happy about a new pet.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: Connecting Africa
programme.desc: The African continent is going through a big transformation and this CNN magazine presents the entrepreneurs, companies and projects that are working hard to modernise it and make its economic integration possible. Hosted by Eleni Giokos, the episodes bring stories about the fast growing industry, network communication, cross-border trade and increasing trading routes, air connectivity, logistics infrastructure, small businesses and more.

programme.title: Fareed Zakaria GPS
programme.desc: Weekly public affairs show hosted by an American journalist, political scientist, and author Fareed Zakaria. The show is broadcasted on CNN every Sunday in many countries of the world. The "GPS" in the shows title stands for "Global Public Square," a reference to the shows focus on international issues and foreign affairs. The guests of the shows one-on-one interviews and roundtable discussions are most prominent figures in the world of global politics, economy and global decision-makers and influencers.

programme.title: African Voices Changemakers
programme.desc: African Voices: Change makers is a CNN programme that focuses on some of Africas brightest and most brilliant change makers as they engineer innovative solutions or beneficial changes that will positively impact their communities. CNN is a constantly evolving and diversifying channel and African Voices is evidence of this new approach to news, utilising sources from across the globe. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: Marketplace Middle East
programme.desc: Uncertainty around U.S. policy is pushing businesses, investors, and governments to rethink long-standing relationships. Rising protectionism is accelerating a shift towards new trade corridors linking the Gulf with China, India, Africa, and within the region itself. At the same time, global capital is on the move. From Wall Street to Riyadh, investors are contending with higher interest rates and fragmented markets, while the Gulf positions itself as both a magnet for international capital and a launchpad for record-breaking IPOs.

programme.title: Marketplace Africa
programme.desc: Unique access to the latest African market information, with a look at events and developments that impact its business world. Follow the business stories that influence the African continent. Eleni Giokos is a CNN correspondent based in the networks Johannesburg bureau and the shows host. Every week she interviews figures of business and industry to reveal the economic trends in various regions of Africa and to present the continents key sectors and corporations.

programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: Each week, Inside Africa documentary series on CNN highlights the unique diversity of mysterious Africa, its numerous cultures and religions, peoples, art, music, cuisine, travel and literature, its one-of-a-kind flora and fauna. Watch the interviews with people from various spheres of life and find out more surprising facts about this continent: how it fights for conservation of rare animals, who the new figures in fashion and design are, what the new educational programs for children look like. Everything what Africa is filled with and lives for is in this series.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: CNN Newroom provides the most up to date news as it breaks and is the longest running show on the channel, airing twice a day Monday to Friday and throughout the day over the weekends. CNN has developed a lot since its founding in 1980 by American media proprietor Ted Turner as a 24 hour cable news channel. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: Amanpour
programme.desc: Global affairs programme in which host Christiane Amanpour analyses some of the most relevant stories from around the world, often adding her personal experiences. She also interviews a variety of notable, high-profile people and key players from various fields.

programme.title: Isa Soares Tonight
programme.desc: Isa Soares deep dives into todays top stories with insightful conversations and reports from around the world.

programme.title: What We Know with Max Foster
programme.desc: Max Foster has a definitive roundup of the days top stories, giving you the urgent need-to-know context, plus a deeper dive into the questions sparking debate around the world.

programme.title: Quest Means Business
programme.desc: Hes not messing around: Richard Quest presents his hot takes on the biggest breaking stories in the world of business. Watch for the expert analysis, commentary and opinions on the important headlines in the field from the notorious English journalist and CNN anchor. Joined by a cast of experts and correspondents delivering unrivaled facts and news, but also features and fascinating takes, figures and analysis on everything going down in the world of business.

programme.title: The Lead with Jake Tapper
programme.desc: News, politics and current affairs programme hosted by the award-winning, American journalist and author, Jake Tapper. Jake Tapper is the chief Washington correspondent for CNN and he will share his knowledge and insight into politics as well as covering a variety of other topics. This programme discusses a range of stories from topical events including national news, economics/finance, sports, health, technology and world affairs. The Lead with Jake Tapper has won a number of awards and accolades including three National Headliner Awards. Outside his work on television, Tapper has written for The New Yorker, The Washington Post and the Los Angeles Times as well as publishing his first novel, a political thriller.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: The Brief with Jim Sciutto
programme.desc: The best of CNNs reporting from correspondents across the world, to guide global audiences through the fast-paced news cycle with insight, analysis and hard-hitting interviews.

programme.title: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Hosted by Erin Burnett, an expert in political science and economics, OutFront is an hour-long news programme examining the latest stories from the US and further afield. Broadcast live from either the New York studio or live on location from the site of a breaking story, the show features insightful opinions from informed guests. With expert analysis from CNNs correspondents and analysis from the shows panel, Erin Burnett OutFront dissects the stories of the day, leaving no stone unturned. Burnett, a former financial analyst for Goldman Sachs, uses her forthright approach to engage interviewees in honest discussion.

programme.title: Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Anderson Cooper delves into the days news, looking beyond the broadcast to give his take, prompting us to re-think what we hear in the headlines. Cooper has covered major, international stories like the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina on the Gulf Coast, the catastrophic BP oil spill and the 2010 earthquake in Haiti, which saw the whole world fall silent. The show has won an absolute plethora of awards over the years, including GLAAD Media and Emmy awards.

programme.title: The Source with Kaitlan Collins
programme.desc: Kaitlan Collins goes straight to the source for the best reporting on the days biggest stories.

programme.title: CNN NewsNight
programme.desc: Abby Phillip leads a roundtable discussion on the days biggest stories and issues shaping our world.

programme.title: Laura Coates Live
programme.desc: Laura Coates goes inside the story with a relentless pursuit of the facts.

programme.title: Finding Escobars Millions
programme.desc: Finding Escobars Millions is a documentary series revolving around one of the most notorious figures- Pablo Escobar, the boss of the Medellin cartel. They say he was worth around $100 billion and that a large amount of it has been buried somewhere in Colombia. Ex-CIA agents, their expert team and the original DEA agents go on a search throughout Colombia to see what they can find. Their mission is epic, they want to return the money to the Colombian people and government.

programme.title: Finding Escobars Millions

programme.title: Border Control Poland
programme.desc: Security and Customs are working hard on the border of Poland constantly trying to prevent illegal items from entering the country. They are on the 24/7 watch detecting crimes and preventing them from happening. Dogs are great helpers when it comes to sniffing up hidden contraband.

programme.title: Border Control Italia
programme.desc: Follows the officers of the Security and Customs Services at the borders of Italy, which are under the constant threat from drugs, weapons, and suspected terrorists.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. The series focuses on the work process in the conditions of permafrost and working relations between the participants. The show has 10 seasons altogether. In some episodes participants start the adventure and travel to Alaska to search for gold because of financial issues. They do not have any previous experience and have to learn on the job. Then there appears several gold mining teams that compete with each other. In some episodes the teams move to South America. Admire the courage and determination of the team members in their unstoppable desire to become rich.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. programme.title: Animals on Drugs
programme.desc: Forrest Galante investigates the wild trend of bears breaking into homes and chugging booze, uncovering shocking encounters and bizarre behaviour.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: As the modern world becomes progressively automated and mechanised its easy to become detached from how things are made and how they work. The hit series returns to uncover the miraculous feats of engineering which underpin life in the 21st century. How the seemingly mundane are often the result of highly sophisticated engineering and production processes. This fascinating behind-the-scenes journey delves deep into the production of everyday modern items from surfboards to satchels and trombones to cricket bats.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: Dive Wars Australia
programme.desc: A fascinating look at the work of daring individuals who hunt for abalone in some of the worlds most dangerous and hostile waters. The crews face harsh conditions of the unpredictable waters as the hunting season starts, trying to catch as much abalone as possible.

programme.title: Dive Wars Australia
programme.desc: A fascinating look at the work of daring individuals who hunt for abalone in some of the worlds most dangerous and hostile waters. The crews face harsh conditions of the unpredictable waters as the hunting season starts, trying to catch as much abalone as possible.

programme.title: Dive Wars Australia
programme.desc: A fascinating look at the work of daring individuals who hunt for abalone in some of the worlds most dangerous and hostile waters. The crews face harsh conditions of the unpredictable waters as the hunting season starts, trying to catch as much abalone as possible.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. In addition to the landscape itself working against the duo, the local wildlife stalk them as well. Of course, the biggest complication for any of the couples might end up being their own clashing egos. Will they make it out alive, or will they fall victim to the wilderness? They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Shortys Dream Shop
programme.desc: Work continues to get the Volkswagen delivery bus across the finish line with a new motor, new suspension, new stance and brand new wheels and tires.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: As the modern world becomes progressively automated and mechanised its easy to become detached from how things are made and how they work. The hit series returns to uncover the miraculous feats of engineering which underpin life in the 21st century. programme.title: How Its Made

programme.title: Fast n Loud
programme.desc: Fast N Loud is a reality styled TV show featuring Richard Rawlings and his crew from the Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage. For most people old rusty cars in garages or open spaces are nothing but junk, but not for these guys. For them it is a perfect chance to reconstruct such vehicles and make some money. The old run-down cars are restored flawlessly and are able to run steadily for the next 10 years for sure. Richard and his crew work really hard to make a name for themselves and have become a huge success thanks to their enormous talents.

programme.title: Ed Stafford: First Man Out
programme.desc: Join English daredevil and adventurer Ed Stafford as he pits himself against some of the most experienced and skilful explorers on the planet in challenges to survive under extreme conditions. This action-packed show provides plenty of heart-stopping drama and excitement as Ed tries to be the First Man Out. Follow Ed as he goes toe-to-toe with an ultra-fit ex-marine as they race across Borneos mangrove swamps while trying to avoid encountering any of the swamps crocodiles; or watch as Ed takes on an ex-special forces soldier from South Korea as they navigate the wilderness home of the wolf in Kazakhstan; or join Ed as he battles with Royal Air Force survival instructor John Hudson as they cross the Himalayas while dealing with monsoon rains and lethal bears.

programme.title: Naked And Afraid Apocalypse
programme.desc: An unrelenting electrical storm pounds the wasteland for three straight days. Hunkered down in a junked car, Alexa struggles to stave off hypothermia.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: American reality series is about Alaskan pioneers Yule and Ruth Kilcher and their kids living together at their homestead. The Kilchers demonstrate one-of-a-kind model of surviving in severe conditions of the last frontier. Enjoy amazing panorama views of Alaska, showing its various nature. Sitting in a comfortable chair in your warm apartment just try to imagine how it really is when electricity and running water is not inevitable fact of life. The Kilchers hunt, go fishing, garden, gather, raise livestock in order to survive Alaskas uncontrollable power and wilderness.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: Unique American reality series that follows a group of friends in Utah- David Heavy D Sparks, David Diesel Dave Kiley, and their crew at DieselSellerz who sell parts for diesel trucks and jeeps, repair and customize pickup trucks. They design and build some of the biggest and most amazing diesel powered vehicles you will ever see, and also do truck giveaways. Watch as they create these awesome masterpieces and enjoy all the crazy adventures they get into while doing it.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard and Paul Cowland travel across the United Kingdom to uncover classic cars to buy, restore and sell on for a profit. The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: Mighty Truckers
programme.desc: This real-life road show follows the lives of twenty truckers from four different countries - Poland, Italy, Germany and the Netherlands. These unique and diverse characters will show the viewers the world of transport, introducing them with the profession of "truck driver". Who are these men and women who ensure that we get various goods on time day and night? What makes them choose the life on the road? This show will answer these questions in an "up close and personal" portrait of trucker life.

programme.title: Border Control Italia

programme.title: Shortys Dream Shop
programme.desc: The owner of 56 Bel Air has had some bad luck with his car going from shop to shop, and he still doesnt have his dream car ready. Shortys shop is the last stop.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Mine Rescue with Freddy and Juan
programme.desc: Mining veteran Freddy Dodge teams up with expert mechanic Juan Ibarra to help struggling mine owners with their failing operations. The pair come to the rescue sharing useful advice, practical knowledge and exclusive gold recovery techniques to transform the operations that could change the lives the mine owners forever.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Did you know that Australia accounts for over 95% of the worlds supply of opal? Well, these miners do, and in this documentary series we follow groups of brave and persevering souls as they scour the land in search of the precious and highly valuable gemstone. With many of the mines located in the desolately deserted Outback, the crews must face some of Australias most treacherous landscapes if they are to hit the jackpot. The six crews have to weigh up the consequences in these old and hazardous mines, often risking their lives in search of opal wealth, not to mention preventing opportunistic thieves from snatching their hauls.

programme.title: Speed Cops
programme.desc: Road police on the hunt for posers and speeders all over Germany. The professionals know exactly whats impressive about cars - and whats illegal.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: NASAS Parker Solar Probe Mission is on its way and will be shortly followed by Europes Solar probe Mission. No spacecraft have traveled so fast or so close to a star before. It is hoped to reveal the source of the solar winds that effect us here on Earth.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The commercial space flight companies are edging closer and closer to flight readiness. Paying customers will soon be launching into space; tourists and their money is thought to be a major step forward into space and beyond. Blue Origin flight tests have been a great success and may launch commercial flights as soon as years end. Virgin Galactic is also smashing mile stones towards flight certification. SpaceX and its Manned Dragon capsule in direct competition with Boeings moves closer to an ISS taxi service.

programme.title: Alien Invaders!
programme.desc: Alien Invaders is a documentary special that throws three young, but experienced, hosts into the world of invasive species of animals, fish, birds, insects, viruses and plants to create television mayhem. The show looks at invasions of aggressive non-indigenous animals around the world. Pacific lionfish are eating their way through the Caribbean, Burmese pythons are infesting the Everglades, African killer bees have worked their way north from Brazil to Utah, Asian carp are now swimming in the millions from New Orleans to Chicago. These and many other "alien invaders" are the villains (and stars!) of our show.

programme.title: Depleted Uranium
programme.desc: More than 50 countries now possess weapons based on depleted uranium (DU). Experimentation has been rife, and the consequences for civilians and the military alike have been dramatic. This investigation compares and contrasts the arguments of those who defend and attack a technology that is highly toxic. For 20 years, scientists, doctors, veterans and activists have denounced the use of DU. Against them are the arms industry lobbyists and nuclear authorities who continue to minimise the risks. Through archive documents, interviews and in situ investigations, accompanied by key witnesses (victims, experts...) we aim to present a clearer picture of the issues and stakes linked to the use of DU. Quick-paced, with a sense of urgency, the film underlines the essential background and conflicting viewpoints, enabling viewers to make up their own minds about a subject that concerns us all.

programme.title: The Polar School of Nomad Children
programme.desc: 360° GEO- Report visits the Nenets, the last true nomads on earth, on their remote Russian peninsula. Every August, on the Russian polar peninsula of Yamal, children of reindeer shepherds await a helicopter that will bring them back to school after the summer holidays. For the main part of the year, 600 nomad children from the indigenous people of the Nenet live and learn separated from their parents. Up until now, their home Yamal was an of Russia that was far from any semblance of civilization- until an enormous gas pool was discovered beneath the tundra. Now, destroyed nature and gigantic industrial plants are a common sight along the nomads track - but this industrial development is also offering new opportunities to their children.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: Following the September 11 attacks, military presence became commonplace in New York and other American cities, and the counterterrorism forces were eﬀ ectively given a "blank cheque" when it came to ensuring that another terrorist incident would never take place on American soil. This episode of CQB takes an in-depth look at who was selected to occupy elite anti-terrorist positions, what they were trained for, and how they were equipped: when opposing forces are using commercial airliners and chemical weapons, countermeasures are by necessity complicated and varied. CQB takes an intimate look at what it was like to be an oﬃ cer on alert for chemical attacks in Washington DC, or an army reservist monitoring suspicious activities on the streets of NYC.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: The former home of Queen Victoria is now home to many spirits who have been seen by guests and staff. Witness the first ever formal documentation of the paranormal activities in the Bulkeley Hotel.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters investigate Thackray Medical Museum, believed to one of Leeds most haunted buildings. Workers claim to have witnessed constant paranormal activity in the museum and one claim is that two Victorian ghosts are trapped inside of the location.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Bienvenido a Miami! We take a look at the history behind Floridas modern metropolis. We visit the Ancient Spanish Monastery, see the opulence of the Vizcaya Museum and Gardens, and head into the swamp to learn about the Miccosukee indians.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: All the essentials for going on, and having a successful safari are covered before our host gets a very special challenge—to find at least half of the "Big Twelve" on one safari drive. Four hours and six (6) very special animals—can he do it using his own rules for a successful safari?

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Nicknamed the Garden of Eden, this volcanic caldera is home to over 25,000 big game animals. Here survival isnt just a game—its a matter of life and death. Youll witness one of the great acts of nature—buffalo, lion and hyena in a face-to-face struggle for dominance. Life in the crater can take surprising twists.

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: From the skyscrapers of Shanghai to the mountainous peaks of "The Last Shangri-La", explore the breathtaking landscape of this incredible country and connect with the people that infuse Chinas everyday life with flavor, passion and prosperity. Through the eyes of a cultural academic, a laborer, an architect, an urban planner, and a photographer, the grand evolution of a little fishing village is illustrated and documented to reveal one of the fastest growing megacities in the world. And while the physical landscape gracefully moves towards the future, beliefs, behaviors, and practices are put into test. The changes brought by the Thirty Year Miracle are indeed immense, and it has left no stone, no life, unturned.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Up, up and away! We discover St. Petersburg Floridas aviation roots at the St.Pete History Museum. Then, comb your mustache, we visit the Dali Museum to look at Salvador Dalis amazing masterworks. Well dredge the deep looking for sponges, and defend the bay at Fort Desoto.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We visit Canadas capital city on a hill in Ottawa, Ontario. Well sail down the famous Rideau Canal locks. We go deep into Ottawas cold war history at the Diefenbunker, as well as, explore Canadas military history at the Canadian War Museum. Then we head up the Peace Tower and take a look at the library of Parliament. Finally, we learn about Canadas first nations tribes at the Canadian History Museum.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Series introduction and the study of Earth from orbit. The sky above is littered with stars and countless galaxies. It is where we come from and where we are destined to return. The first phase of this journey is complete, now commences the second, with robotics, advanced technologies and sheer daring we are now going where before we only dreamt.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The Moon, our closest celestial companion. Our indispensible dance partner through the cosmos. Lighting our night sky and gently tugging at our shores. Few have walked on her surface, though her allure remains strong, once again we are glancing her way with renewed interest and with a view to return very soon.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: If you ever go camping there is one thing you do not want to leave home without, the SWISS ARMY KNIFE! Well explain how it evolved into the most famous knife in the world and how the companys name got "CUT" together! And where did the term CUP OF JOE come from as well as the word JAVA? And we all love a juicy HAMBURGER, so where did these chopped meat patties come from?

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Learn how ALMOND NUTS get transformed into "MILK." And why are movie TRAILERS shown at the beginning of the film? Well keep your attention so youll want to stick around for the answer. And learn how detergents make your clothes SEEM brighter and whiter.

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: From the skyscrapers of Shanghai to the mountainous peaks of "The Last Shangri-La", explore the breathtaking landscape of this incredible country and connect with the people that infuse Chinas everyday life with flavor, passion and prosperity. Through the eyes of a cultural academic, a laborer, an architect, an urban planner, and a photographer, the grand evolution of a little fishing village is illustrated and documented to reveal one of the fastest growing megacities in the world. And while the physical landscape gracefully moves towards the future, beliefs, behaviors, and practices are put into test. The changes brought by the Thirty Year Miracle are indeed immense, and it has left no stone, no life, unturned.

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: China Uncovered is a documentary exploring the changing culture of China, from everyday life to nature and cities, from tradition to modernism. Discover this country from the perspective of locals, including a photographer, a laborer and an architect. Witness how Shanghai turned into a mega city from a small fishing village, and how is that affecting the everyday life and traditional practices and beliefs.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. The matter that built skies and seas, the atoms that make up you and me, the chemistry around us that forms the things we touch, smell and see. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. The matter that built skies and seas, the atoms that make up you and me, the chemistry around us that forms the things we touch, smell and see. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: A Year in the Wild
programme.desc: Rosemary catches up with the conservancys rarest large carnivore, a coalition of 3 male cheetahs. The Pungwe pack get waist deep into their hunting as they pursue a wildebeest into a water pan. Denning season has begun. The pack are on the hunt for impala. Rosemary deals with a shocking snare removal. The splinters take on another herd of wildebeest.

programme.title: Capture Wild School
programme.desc: Very quick intro to the history of the course and the make up of the influx of new students as well as a look at some of the lecturers and their characters. Darting practice and drug theory: Students practice with dart guns from certain distances and learn the theory of dangerous drugs. The next step is learning to dart from a helicopter. A moving target is towed by a vehicle, and students have 1 dart to prove their accuracy. Darting practice on donkeys: 3 teams are formed and they have 3 donkeys to dart and check all vital signs. Darting 2 young antelope: 2 students are chosen to dart a young Rhone antelope and young Sable needing medical attention.

programme.title: Capture Wild School
programme.desc: A student darter is selected to dart from the helicopter and soon a suitable giraffe is located. The dart location is perfect and the giraffe begins to slow down as the rest of the team jump into action. The giraffe becomes more of a challenge as it wrestles with the rope and breaks free. The drugs eventually take full effect and the giraffe is subdued. The team carry out all the checkups, take samples and reverse the drug in good time to see it run off in good health. The vet lecturers give the debrief and conclude with all the positives and negatives.

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: There are many fine examples of evolutionary history in the natural world. Animals adapt through a series of small, random mutations and usually do so in order to compete more effectively for food, water and space. Animals with certain adaptations are more likely to be stronger and therefore produce more young. Crocodiles are certainly of an ancient lineage, they are believed to be 200 million years old, whereas dinosaurs became extinct 64 million years ago. Crocodiles have an incredible ability to adapt and survive in the Race of Life. They have a very slow metabolism, and can go up to a year with no food. They also have a 4 chamber heart that helps them control their temperature, and lungs that allow them to hold their breath underwater for up to 2 hours. Sharks have gone through the process of adaptation and evolutionary experimentation as well. The modern descendants of ancient sharks have incorporated many of the successful traits of the past. They have changed over time, but the changes have not been too extreme, only nature perfecting an originally near perfect design. Whales are an amazing species that have evolved from land dwelling creatures millions of years ago to the marine mammals we know today. Over the course of their evolution whales have developed echolocation, thick layers of blubber, modified lungs, better hearing and larger arteries among other things to ensure their survival and prosperity.

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: Deserts are dry. Deserts are extreme. True deserts get less than 18 cm of rain per year. True deserts have very few plants. Semi-desert habitats have enough rainfall to support more plant and animal life. Either way, deserts are not easy places for animals to live. Desert animals have evolved to handle the deserts heat and lack of water. They have adapted their bodies and behaviors to the desert climate. Most can survive on small amounts of water and many get all of their water from their food. Some drink maybe once a week and travel considerable distances to find isolated waterholes and springs. Large animals seek shade during the hottest part of the day. Some animals dig a hollow depression into the ground and lie in the cooler soil while others are nocturnal. Many reptiles and other animals protect themselves from the extreme temperature by spending their time in burrows. The scorpion is one of the most ancient creatures on earth, in existence since life first crawled out of the sea. One look and you can see why theyre born survivors. Not only are their bodies armoured against the desert heat - and other predators - but all scorpions have pincers at the front and a poisonous sting at the end of their tail. Rattlesnakes can be two meters long. Theyre fast, tough and with a deadly venom, making them one of the most dangerous snakes in the world. But nobody seems to have told the Roadrunner, who regard rattlesnakes as quite suitable prey.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Chasing Tales
programme.desc: 3 wild dog packs are introduced, Pungwe, Mapura and Splinters pack. We see 16 Pungwe pups emerge for the first time out of their den site. The motorbike camera crew manage to record their first successful wild dog hunt. Rosemary and Jess are urgently called out to dart and remove the snare from one of the dogs. Another hunt is recorded by the motorbike and filming drone crew.

programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: Disasters in the air and misfortunes at sea grab our attention because of the unusually large number of fatalities involved. But its not even necessary to leave dry land for a terrible disaster to happen. Rail journeys and even just getting in your car can be fraught with disaster. Thats the focus for this instalment of Desperate Hours - road and rail disasters. We will examine the causes of such accidents, be that the powers of nature or human folly. We are about to explore the worst of the worst destructive events from an ordinary day on Nigerian roads to a disastrous display of human error in Santiago de Compostella when the driver of a loaded passenger train went about 115 km/h over the established speed limit and drove his train straight into a wall. So buckle up; youre in for a bumpy ride…

programme.title: WWII Documentary Films
programme.desc: Award-winning documentary films produced to enlighten future generations about the personal stories of the WWII generations.

programme.title: The Polar School of Nomad Children

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: "Special Operations" are special divisions of military, police or intelligence services that are highly qualified in specific areas of urban warfare and in a variety of special weapons and technology. Over the past forty years, all of the worlds superpowers have built up these groups in order to better fight wars, to counter terrorism and to conduct high-stakes police actions. This episode examines the history of such organizations, from the Green Berets, WWII paratroopers and naval special warfare units through to the Seal Team 6, the British SAS, and private contractors, including Black Water and Brown and Root. Showing how these operators are trained, how they plan, and what weaponry and tactical gear they use, the introductory episode of CQB provides viewers with a fast-paced overview of the techniques, strategies and equipment that have been successfully used by Military Special Operations.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: For over 24 years, East Timor (now known as Timor Leste) endured a crushing occupation inflicted on them by neighbouring Indonesia on the pretext of the fight against communism. The war was brought to a controversial conclusion in 1999. However, trauma from that period lives on as evidenced by the testimonies of Nelson Belo, Gregorio Saldanha and Pascal Oliveira, survivors of the infamous 1991 Santa Cruz Massacre. This film recalls the trauma of Timor Leste in this the tenth anniversary of its independence.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: The county of Flintshire in Wales is said to be a land filled with ghosts and haunts. Plas Teg is said to be one of the "most haunted" houses in the area. With over 400 years of history, this place is sure to be the home of many an entity.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters travel to Hull to investigate ghostly goings on inside of a former chocolate factory. The investigation turns out to be no picnic, as the ghosts haunting make direct contact with the team.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Un-Belizable! Were off on a Central American Mayan excursion. We head up the steps of the ancient high temple at Lamanai. Then we take a city tour of the main tourist destination, Belize City. We learn about Belizes colonial roots at the Belize City History Museum and dive the amazing Blue Hole.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Nicknamed the Garden of Eden, this volcanic caldera is home to over 25,000 big game animals. Here survival isnt just a game—its a matter of life and death. Youll witness one of the great acts of nature—buffalo, lion and hyena in a face-to-face struggle for dominance. Life in the crater can take surprising twists.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Nairobi is the capital of Kenya and one of the most fascinating cities in Africa. On our visit well see the colonial architecture of a bygone era and the ultra-modern side of town as well. Well learn the truth behind the "Out of Africa" story and our host gets eye-to-eye with some endangered giraffes.

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: Famous Chinese Erhu player Zhao Lei is leaving his stamp on classical Chinese music by experimenting with musical fusion between the East and West. On a sharper note in downtown Shanghai, Yuyintang Livehouse opens its doors to contemporary music lovers. The spiritual home of cutting edge beats in Shanghai, Yuyintang has started the careers of Visual Kei band Lilith and progressive metal rockers Mathlotus, but the modern music scene is still reeling from the Rock n Roll ban of the Cultural Revolution. Join them as they strive to become the rock stars of tomorrow.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: This show features some segments that didnt fit in their respective episodes. We play around at the Pinball Museum in Las Vegas. Then, we salute the Commander in Chief at the Presidential Hall of Fame in Clermont, FL. Also, well swim with real mermaids at Weeki Wachee Springs in Central Florida, and cheer on Teddy Ballgame at the Ted Williams Hitters Hall of Fame.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We set sail to the land of the Norseman in Oslo, Norway. Well climb the fort walls at Akershus Fortress and discover the North and South Poles at the Fram Museum. Then, well unearth ancient viking ship treasures at the Viking Ship Museum, and well brave the open waters of the Pacific with Thor Heyerdahl at the Kon-tiki museum.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.
