programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: En route to the Shetland Islands, a high-tech turboprop is struck by lightning, temporarily blinding the crew and disabling their controls. The pilots declare a Mayday as the plane plunges into a terrifying nosedive. Just seconds before impact, they manage to regain control. And once theyre safely on the ground, investigators uncover an unusual feature in the plane that plays a key role in this calamity.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: In October 2018, the first fatal aviation tragedy occurred involving the 737 MAX, killing all 189 people on board. Lion Air flight 610 was only in flight for 13 minutes before losing control and plunging into the sea. Soon after in March 2019, another 737 MAX leaving from Ethiopia crashed 6 minutes after takeoff, killing everyone. Investigators share how these tragedies couldve been avoided.

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically dissected, analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis using all the evidence. How did the shuttle Columbia tear itself to pieces during reentry? Why did so many die in the worst high speed train crash in history at Eschede in Germany? How did a concrete high rise in London called Grenfell Tower become an inferno that killed 72?

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: Every year, thousands of train crashes and devastating plane disasters occur worldwide. From hijackings to technological failures, these incidents highlight the inherent dangers of travel. Despite daily advancements, a single mistake can lead to catastrophic outcomes. Join us as we explore the 10 most significant air crashes and train accidents, uncovering the tragic events that capture global attention and impact countless lives.

programme.title: Inside Sydney Airport
programme.desc: With weekend vacationers and commuters returning home, Friday is always a busy day at the airport. More passengers means more problems, keeping the Duty Managers on high alert. Today its an air ambulance emergency, security breaches, illegal drugs and a shouting passenger facing a ban from the airline shes booked to fly on.

programme.title: Inside Sydney Airport
programme.desc: Sydney Airport is a city within a city, with thousands of crew keeping operations flowing. The work never slows, from changing a wind sock, painting a runway at midnight, repairing a stuck airbridge before the plane arrives, saving a maintenance worker from a stuck elevator, or putting out a potentially catastrophic fire that traps hundreds of passengers on a recently arrived flight.

programme.title: Inside Sydney Airport
programme.desc: With the Prime Minister of Singapore due to arrive, Security at the airport is on high alert. A passenger is detected in possession of a dangerous weapon. Meanwhile the search is on for a woman reported to have collapsed on the street. Duty Manager Mel is excited to learn that hell escort his favourite Pop Artist when they arrive at Sydney Airport.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: The Battle of Jutland was the most violent sea battle in history, fought in 1916 between the mighty battle fleets of Britain and Germany. After a day of carnage, both sides claimed victory. So who really won? Maritime archaeologists and historians go in search of Jutlands secrets, hidden deep underwater. Scientific data combines with computer graphics to drain the North Sea, investigating the mega battleships of World War One and asks what happened to them once the firing was over.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: The Pacific Ring of Fire - an underwater hotbed of volcanoes, mega-quakes and giant tsunamis. 500 million people live in ever-present danger along its edges. Combining CGI with cutting-edge ocean-mapping technology we drain the Pacific Ocean to reveal the deadly geological forces behind Earths most destructive natural disasters, and uncover catastrophic threats lying just off the coast of Seattle, Tokyo and New Zealand.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: On 17 January 2008, British Airways Flight 38 was approaching London Heathrow Airport when it crashed just short of the runway. The uneventful passenger flight from Beijing, China turned almost fatal when a lack of power to both engines caused the Boeing 777 to crash. Quick thinking by the crew and Captain Peter Burkill prevented the incident from being fatal and saved all 152 people on board.

programme.title: Sally
programme.desc: Sally Ride became the first American woman to blast off into space, but beneath her unflappable composure, she carried a secret. Revealing the romance and sacrifices of their 27 years together, Sallys life partner, Tam OShaughnessy, tells the full story of this complicated and iconic astronaut for the first time. SALLY is directed by Emmy Award-winning filmmaker Cristina Costantini.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: On his first day, Australian Border Force recruit Nelson makes a find. A daring pushback trial ten years in the making involving multiple aircraft is under threat. Baggage manager Brodie faces the challenge of handling 2,000 bags during a system upgrade. A father and son pilot duo tackle a new flight simulator.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Africas Deadliest
programme.desc: A national Geographic documentary looking into the deadliest animals that roam Africa. Examining animals that have evolved complex weapons from teeth to claws and agility so that they can protect themselves and battle effectively. From elephant tusks that can defend or attack to the fur, speed and agility of seals. Showing how these animals have exceptional skills and power alongside their body features that have developed into ideal tools for their needs.

programme.title: Africas Big Five
programme.desc: What are Africas Big Five? Meet the continents most iconic wildlife.Once mostly targeted by hunters, these large species are "awe-inspiring" sights for safari-goers.

programme.title: Africas Deadliest

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: Its summer in Michigan, which means time to bale some hay! Its a grueling process, but Dr. Pol, Charles, and Ben manage to mow their hayfield, which is the first step in baling. But a surprise rainstorm could ruin this years hay haul. They hope for sun, so their crop doesnt spoil before they can bale. Meanwhile, the Pols bring in their next animal to the farm - an emu!

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: Its the county fair season! The Pols plan to get at least two cows and six sheep at the auction, but they have a lot to do before that can happen. First up, they must install a new perimeter fence. Charles and Ben think they are off to a good start, but when Dr. Pol points out how sneaky sheep can be, their workload doubles. Meanwhile, Beth is hoping for a goat at the small animal auction.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols need to break ground for a new outbuilding that will house incoming livestock and Charles has dreamt up an outrageous idea of what that structure can be - and it just may be just crazy enough to work. At the auction, the Pols are hoping to purchase sheep and cows, but the skyrocketing bids threaten their big plans.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The bidding is live at the large animal auction! The Pols are working towards their goal of bringing home sheep and cows to their farm. Any animals they win will be delivered to the farm in just three days, so the pressure is on to get the sheep hut finished in time - and there is a ton left to do. Meanwhile, Beth and Charles are concerned about the low activity in their beehives.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. programme.title: Predator Bloodlines
programme.desc: In the animal kingdom, bloodlines are considered to be incredibly important. Investigating to what extent animals genetic code can influence its survival in the merciless world of nature, the story takes a closer look at the lives of six predators, zooming in on the challenges and tribulations these extraordinary creatures face on a daily basis. Will their bloodlines continue or fall away as the stronger ones take their place?

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: The sparse African Savannah can be a fearsome place for both herds of powerful prey and the lurking predators who hunt them down. In this captivating documentary series from National Geographic, the relationship between predator and prey is closely examined, exploring the fight for survival for both sets of animals. These herds are full of powerful or agile animals, making the job of a predator to feed itself and its family a troublesome task. But the African predators are ruthless and proficient hunters, and if a herd is infiltrated, or a straggling member is targeted, they will struggle to evade these savage carnivores.

programme.title: Predator Bloodlines

programme.title: Predator Bloodlines
programme.desc: She overthrew the preceding ruler of North Clan in an unprecedented take-over, fighting her way up from a lowly rank to matriarch. She is both a ruthless battle commander, leading her clan in warfare against rivals and adversaries like lion, and devoted guardian to her clan and parent to her offspring.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol Compilations
programme.desc: Theres not much that Dr. Jan Pol hasnt seen throughout his long, veterinarian career. The Dutch-born veterinarian has been helping animals since he graduated from Utrecht University in 1970. In this series we look back at memorable moments from his reality series, The Incredible Dr. Pol, where alongside his employees and his family he helps nurse a variety of creatures back to health from his Michigan-based practice. His clients come in all shapes and sizes, often needing urgent medical assistance, something that Dr. Jan Pol lives for. The passionate veterinarian is always keen to help, and we revisit the original series greatest moments.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol Compilations

programme.title: Heartland Docs
programme.desc: Reality series following husband and wife veterinarians Ben and Erin Schroeder as they tend to animals in rural Nebraska. In this picturesque corner of the midwestern state, doctors Ben and Erin do all they can to ensure the local animals get the attention and care they deserve. Braving fierce blizzards, treacherous tornados and scorching summers, the pair of veterinarians let nothing stop them from administering medical treatment to local livestock.

programme.title: Heartland Docs, DVM: Compilation
programme.desc: New life and unpredictable veterinary challenges put Ben and Erin Schroeder to the test when they take on a litter of feral cats with mites, an old dog with tumors, make friends with a feral feline, and deliver a batch of adorable puppies. No matter the animals lot in life, this animal-loving couple wont give up on them.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: This family farm needs a barn! The Pols are ready to tackle their next big project: preserving and carefully taking down a 100-year-old barn since, with every piece they remove makes the barn weaker and weaker. There is no room for error if they are going to transport these irreplaceable beams back to the farm and restore it to its former glory.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols have reached the most dangerous stage of disassembling the 100-year-old barn: taking down the beams. Then, if all goes well, theyll transport the beams back to the farm. Each part of this process must be carefully orchestrated to protect these irreplaceable beams. Meanwhile, Beth tries training Clovis after he runs away from the farm.

programme.title: Equators Wild Secrets
programme.desc: At zero degrees latitude, the equator is the imaginary line that runs across the middle of our spheroid planet, passing through 13 countries that are home to diverse and wild ecosystems. In this six-part documentary series, we explore a wonderful natural area in each episode, revealing its stunning and unique wildlife. The team travel to the Galapagos islands, the Andes mountains, the Amazon rainforest, Africa, Borneo and Sumatra, and the coral seas that thrive off the abundant, equatorial sunlight, showcasing the vastly contrasting environments that are dotted along the equator.

programme.title: Blood Rivals: Lion vs Buffalo
programme.desc: The brute force and collective strategy of buffalo is necessary as one breeding herd fends off relentless attacks from the local lion pride.

programme.title: Cat Attack-Tics
programme.desc: Explore the many ways wild cats go in for the kill. Cats rarely seen in action, such as the marbled cat, the fishing cat and the sand cat, will all be featured in Cat Attack-tics. Classic Nat Geo footage is mixed with high-tech graphics, freeze frames and photo finishes to magnify the killer weaponry.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol Compilations
programme.desc: Theres not much that Dr. Jan Pol hasnt seen throughout his long, veterinarian career. The Dutch-born veterinarian has been helping animals since he graduated from Utrecht University in 1970. In this series we look back at memorable moments from his reality series, The Incredible Dr. Pol, where alongside his employees and his family he helps nurse a variety of creatures back to health from his Michigan-based practice. His clients come in all shapes and sizes, often needing urgent medical assistance, something that Dr. Jan Pol lives for. The passionate veterinarian is always keen to help, and we revisit the original series greatest moments.

programme.title: Wild South Africa
programme.desc: Wild South Africa is an amazing documentary series that aims to reveal all the unique beauty and wildness, unbelievable diversity and greatness of the country where you can find both heat and cold, desert and tropics. Have a look at the mighty oceans of the Cape Peninsula, where two ocean currents merge. See the the dry Kalahari Desert and its inhabitants. Check out fantastic animals of South African semi-deserts and savannahs, like caracals, servals, the insect-eating pangolin and many more.

programme.title: Blood Rivals: Lion vs Buffalo
programme.desc: The brute force and collective strategy of buffalo is necessary as one breeding herd fends off relentless attacks from the local lion pride.

programme.title: Cat Attack-Tics
programme.desc: Explore the many ways wild cats go in for the kill. Cats rarely seen in action, such as the marbled cat, the fishing cat and the sand cat, will all be featured in Cat Attack-tics. Classic Nat Geo footage is mixed with high-tech graphics, freeze frames and photo finishes to magnify the killer weaponry.

programme.title: Equators Wild Secrets
programme.desc: At zero degrees latitude, the equator is the imaginary line that runs across the middle of our spheroid planet, passing through 13 countries that are home to diverse and wild ecosystems. In this six-part documentary series, we explore a wonderful natural area in each episode, revealing its stunning and unique wildlife. programme.title: Blood Rivals: Lion vs Buffalo
programme.desc: The brute force and collective strategy of buffalo is necessary as one breeding herd fends off relentless attacks from the local lion pride.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: This family farm needs a barn! The Pols are ready to tackle their next big project: preserving and carefully taking down a 100-year-old barn since, with every piece they remove makes the barn weaker and weaker. There is no room for error if they are going to transport these irreplaceable beams back to the farm and restore it to its former glory.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols have reached the most dangerous stage of disassembling the 100-year-old barn: taking down the beams. Then, if all goes well, theyll transport the beams back to the farm. Each part of this process must be carefully orchestrated to protect these irreplaceable beams. Meanwhile, Beth tries training Clovis after he runs away from the farm.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols new livestock arent potty trained; their sheep hut isnt draining properly and has now been transformed into a Pee Palace. Its late fall and the winter deep freeze is just around the corner, so the family needs to get it fixed fast. The Pols also get a new sheep for their farm.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pol clan gets to work on creating Beths dream garden. To beat the incoming rainstorm, an exhausted Ben works around the clock to finish building the gardens pond and waterfall. Noticing her brother is near his breaking point, Beth plans a special surprise to lift his spirits.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest
programme.desc: Wildlife documentary looking at the species that have a fearsome reputation. Travelling across the world, this series focuses on formidable predators of the natural world and the deadliest creatures in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Killers
programme.desc: In the darkest corners of the world, deadly predators watch and wait for their next, unsuspecting prey. Armed with special nighttime powers, including extra-strength night vision and hypersensitive hearing, these creatures are anatomically designed to succeed in the dark.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest
programme.desc: Wildlife documentary looking at the species that have a fearsome reputation. Travelling across the world, this series focuses on formidable predators of the natural world and the deadliest creatures in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: To win the game of life, it can take more than brute force. Animals with a super-powered sixth sense can get the edge on fast-moving prey, beat the elements, and find food in unlikely places.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Killers
programme.desc: In the darkest corners of the world, deadly predators watch and wait for their next, unsuspecting prey. Armed with special nighttime powers, including extra-strength night vision and hypersensitive hearing, these creatures are anatomically designed to succeed in the dark.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Killers
programme.desc: In the animal kingdom, females are tough, feisty and fearless. But these lady-killers dont just get by on their good looks; they use their paws, claws and jaws to ensure survival for themselves and their offspring. From the fierce protectiveness of a mama grizzly bear, to the cunning teamwork employed by lady lions this hour of WORLDS DEADLIEST is dedicated to the Lady Killers.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Killers
programme.desc: There are some places on this planet that are so wild that if you go there...you may not come out ALIVE.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa ķepaiņu celtnieku ģimene pārceļas uz kaimiņpilsētu Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, rotaļājas un būvē visu kopienai nepieciešamo.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras ģimene taisa pinjatu par godu māmiņas dzimšanas dienai, taču tā aizlido! Vai viņi to atradīs, pirms pārnāks māmiņa? Garnadzis nočiepj neredzamības segu un sāk čiept visu pēc kārtas. Dorai viņš jāaptur!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo neprot zīmēt. Viņam piemetas žagas, no kurām netiek vaļā. Viņš jau grasās padoties, kad nejauši rada jaunu mākslas novirzienu. Barbaliba grib piedalīties rakstīšanas konkursā, taču brāļi un māsas neļauj koncentrēties.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma paziņo bērniem, ka divatā dosies atpūsties uz Lieldienu salu. Barbabērni, dvīņi un Stingrā kungs dodas izbraucienā ar jahtu.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un viņa draugi nāk talkā konsteblam Velsam, lai atrisinātu pazudušā Vindzoras rubīna lietu. Pateicoties Lūsijas tantes īpašajai receptei, Brauni mājās uzsāk ēdināšanas biznesu, bet tas ir smags darbs.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un viņa draugi nāk talkā konsteblam Velsam, lai atrisinātu pazudušā Vindzoras rubīna lietu. Pateicoties Lūsijas tantes īpašajai receptei, Brauni mājās uzsāk ēdināšanas biznesu, bet tas ir smags darbs.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcim vajadzīga pasta nodaļa! Bet, kad celtni apsēž vāveres, suņiem jāizdomā risinājums. Rabla komanda izmanto savas būvniecības prasmes, lai pārveidotu super auto mazgātavu un nomazgātu fermeres Zojas sušķīgos dzīvniekus.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda strādā, lai pārvērstu Celtnieklīča pludmales promenādi spožā, svinīgā ziemas brīnumzemē. Kad sniegota diena izjauc Motores un Miksas Virpuļvāveres plānus, Rabla komanda dara to, ko prot vislabāk... būvē.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcī tiek uzbūvēta pirmā viesnīca, kad ciemos atbrauc fermeres Zojas brālēns Hedlijs. Kad juceklis uz dabas takas apmulsina visus Dakija Dū kunga dzimšanas dienas ballītes viesus, ķepaiņi viņiem palīdz atrast ceļu.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un viņa draugi nāk talkā konsteblam Velsam, lai atrisinātu pazudušā Vindzoras rubīna lietu. Pateicoties Lūsijas tantes īpašajai receptei, Brauni mājās uzsāk ēdināšanas biznesu, bet tas ir smags darbs.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un viņa draugi nāk talkā konsteblam Velsam, lai atrisinātu pazudušā Vindzoras rubīna lietu. Pateicoties Lūsijas tantes īpašajai receptei, Brauni mājās uzsāk ēdināšanas biznesu, bet tas ir smags darbs.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtonam jāizvēlas starp Angliju un Peru, pirms sākas futbola kausa mačs, taču viņš abas valstis mīl vienādi stipri. Pienācis brīdis tantei Lūsijai doties mājās, bet atlicis laiks vēl pēdējam piedzīvojumam. Vai tomēr ne?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais izturas dīvaini. Ko viņš slēpj? Barbabērni darīs visu, lai to uzzinātu. Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbamazuļi atrod ziloņu mazuli un slepeni par to rūpējas. Kā Barbatētis un Barbamamma reaģēs uz Borisu? Zilonis Boriss ilgojas pēc mājām. Barbapapas nolemj vest viņu atpakaļ uz Āfriku. Turpat viņi palīdz Borisam pielāgoties.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ar steigu jāuzbūvē liels dambis, kas pilsētu pasargās no plūdiem Fermeri Zoju piemeklē likstas - ražu apēd neatlaidīga vāvere.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komandai jāizdekorē Sjerras Spīdošās skatuve, koncerts izvēršas neticams Bodnieks Gabriels rīko savu gardumu izstādi, un Rabla komanda dodas palīgā.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbamazuļi atrod ziloņu mazuli un slepeni par to rūpējas. Kā Barbatētis un Barbamamma reaģēs uz Borisu? Zilonis Boriss ilgojas pēc mājām. Barbapapas nolemj vest viņu atpakaļ uz Āfriku. Turpat viņi palīdz Borisam pielāgoties.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Vērojot zvaignzes Barbatētis un Lolita pamana lidojošo šķivīti un steidz pamodināt visu ģimeni. Izrādās, ka ciemos atlidojuši draugi, kuriem līdzi ir lielkājains mazulis, kurš pēkšņi uzradās viņu planētā. programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims izzina Rūkoņtaunu, lai atrastu vietu, kur baudīt jautrību vienatnē. Tims un Kaja cenšas sarīkot Pārkijam neaizmirstamu dienu. Kad vētras dēļ Reksiem jāpaliek mājās, viņiem jāizdomā, kā pavadīt laiku.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa nejauši sabojā mammas datoru, tāpēc tētis mēģina to salabot.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa māca Džordžam spēlēt bumbu. Un vēlāk viņi spēlē spēli kopā ar mammu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Tētis ir noskumis, jo viņš pazaudējis brilles, tāpēc Pepa un Džordžs palīdz tās meklēt.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs palīdz vectēvam dārzā iesēt sēklas.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Džordžam sākas žagas, kad viņš par strauju izdzer sulu, tāpēc Pepa mēģina palīdzēt.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Tētis izaudzējis lielu ķirbi. Pepa brauc ar savu riteni, bet vēlas to darīt bez palīgriteņiem. Drīz vien viņa ietriecas ķirbī.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Mamma iedod Pepai kasti, kas jātur noslēpumā.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa kopā ar ģimeni dodas piknikā. Tētis pēc lielās ēšanas aizmieg, bet tad kārtīgi izsportojas, bēgot no lapsenes.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras palīdzību lūdz košā alebrihe Ale. Alebrihu koks ir novītis, tāpēc Dorai jādodas meklēt varavīksnes ūdens. Karstā dienā visi ilgojas pēc saldējuma, bet Valas furgons ir iestidzis smiltīs! Dora iet palīgā, lai visi tiktu pie aukstā našķa.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda palīdz Riveram uzņemt daudz fotogrāfiju foto konkursam, uzbūvējot ļoti ātru veidu, kā pārvietoties pa Celtnieklīci. Rabls un ķepaiņi palīdz Karlam pagatavot saldējumu visiem. Ja vien Ātrmeistars viņiem netraucēs...

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad Ātrmeistara izdomājums cieš neveiksmi, Rabls ar komandu uzbūvē lielāku un drošāku atrakciju.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras palīdzību lūdz košā alebrihe Ale. Alebrihu koks ir novītis, tāpēc Dorai jādodas meklēt varavīksnes ūdens. Karstā dienā visi ilgojas pēc saldējuma, bet Valas furgons ir iestidzis smiltīs! Dora iet palīgā, lai visi tiktu pie aukstā našķa.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.title: Dora

Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda uzbūvē māju vecā kokā - īstu štābiņu vairākos stāvos! Izbēg fermeres Zojas jaunās vistiņas, Rabla komandai darba pilnas rokas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš atrod Doras pazudušo dzimšanas dienas torti, un visa ģimene sarīko viņai pārsteiguma ballīti! Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz Mēnesnīcai atrast Mēnesspuķi, lai visi varētu priecāties Mēnessgaismas fiestā.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni sagatavo izrādi Barbamammai dzimšanas dienā. Kamēr Barbalala uzkopj, viņi sodas uz lunaparku, kur Barbabo iesprūst karuselī. Trīs atsevišķi stāsti saplūst kopā pagalma vidū.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni domā, ka ēdiens spēj likt tiem mainīt krāsu un formu, tāpēc izlemj atrast katram piemēroto ēdienu. Barbabo nav iedvesmas, tāpēc vairs nespēj radīt. Visa ģimene palīdz, iesakot jaunas zīmējumu tēmas.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: No Piedzīvojumu līča atbrauc Rokijs, lai apciemotu Rabla komandu. Tieši laikā, lai redzētu Celtnieklīča jauno lācēnu! Kad reindžere Roza lūdz palīdzēt ar celtniecību, Ātrmeistars netīšām iznīcina lāču māju. Ķepaiņiem un Rokijam jāglābj situācija.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis grib iemācīt bērniem cept maizi, bet nekas nenotiek, kā plānots. Barbamazuļi iestāda avokado koku. Taču līdz ražai jāgaida vairāki gadi. Barbagudrajam ir ideja ietaupīt laiku.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabella lepni ģimenei paziņo, ka nolēmusi kļūt par princesi.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais izturas dīvaini. Ko viņš slēpj? Barbabērni darīs visu, lai to uzzinātu. Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais izturas dīvaini. Ko viņš slēpj? Barbabērni darīs visu, lai to uzzinātu. Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un tētis netiek prom attāla asteroīda. Tims, Kaja un Tomijs cenšas dabūt laukā bumbu no mammas istabas. Tims cenšas dabūt lejā Tijas jauno balonu, kas ieķēries kokā.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Mamma un tētis bēniņos atrod instrumentu kasti. Pepa un Džordžs tos izmēģina.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Vardes, tārpi un tauriņi. Pepa un Džordžs atdarina skaistos tauriņus, lokanos tārpus un dubļainās vardes.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs visus sasmīdina, kad pārģērbjas par mammu un tēti.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa pazaudē kurpes, bet tiek pie jaunām. Tagad viņa tajās ir tik priecīga, ka atsakās tās novilkt.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa kopā ar ģimeni dodas uz skolas pasāumu un izklaidējas, esot tur. Pepas un viņas draugu sejas nokrāso kā tīģeriem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ir mammas dzimšanas diena, Pepa, Džordžs un tētis plāno lielu pārsteigumu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepai izkrīt zobs, tāpēc viņa to paliek zem spilvena Zobu fejai, bet baidās, ka tā varētu būt nejauka.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Vectēvs dārzā paslēpj dārgumus. Kad Pepa un Džordžs ierodas, viņiem tie jāmeklē.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Isa rīko ballīti, kurā visi dejos Mūžameža ritmu. Ceļā uz svētkiem Zābaciņam jāpagūst iemācīties dejas soļus! Dora ar draugiem dodas uz Likstu un Lamatu Mežu, lai atrastu Tiko burvju riekstu, kurš spēj pārvērsties par ikviena mīļāko našķi.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku. Barbazū nejauši atklāj spēju atdarināt Barbatēti. Viņš to izmanto, lai sadalītu darbus brāļiem un māsām. Vai viņi to uzzinās?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Bērniem ir garlaicīgi, jo ārā līst lietus. Bet vecāki zina, ka vajag tikai nedaudz iztēles, lai varētu izklaidēties aŗī lietū. Bērniem iztēle ir lieliska, varbūt pat pārāk... // Barbagudrais radīja dekoderi, kurš spēj iztulkot dzīvnieku skaņas, bet dzīvnieki fermā un pagalmā neko interesantu nesaka. Barbazū lūdz iztulkot okeāna iemītnieku valodu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma atgriežas pie koka, zem kura piedzima. Tas ir sliktā stāvoklī. Viņiem tas steidzami jāglābj.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija apmaldās izklaides centrā. Tims meklē jaunu, sev piemērotu raķeti. Kad Terija pieskata bērnus, Tims cenšas apiet visus noteikumus.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mērei Greitvejai vajag daudz picas, un ātri! Bet, kad pieslēdzas Ātrmeistars, suņiem jānovērš viņa picas problēma. Kad ģimene pa Ātrmeistara ceļu nevar pagūt uz lidostu, Rabla komandai līdz izlidošanai jāuzbūvē jauns ceļš.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mēre Greitveja un Dakija Dū kungs vēlas nodemonstrēt savas izpletņlēkšanas prasmes. Taču, kad patraucē vējš, suņi palīdz viņiem lēkt ar izpletni uz zemes! Kad Vīleram un cūkai Trifelei nesanāk slidot, komanda rod risinājumu uz riteņiem!

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz pūķītei Svītijai iemācīties lidot un atgriezties pie vecākiem Mākoņu alās. Kad Lielā Sarkanā Cāļa burvju triks liek Karalienei un Garnadzim samainīties vietām, Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz viņus pārvērst atpakaļ!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma paziņo bērniem, ka divatā dosies atpūsties uz Lieldienu salu. Barbabērni, dvīņi un Stingrā kungs dodas izbraucienā ar jahtu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbaliba, Barbalala un Barbabella pēc kārtas stāsta stāstu. Katra iekļauj tajā ko ļoti personīgu. Barbapapu ģimene pavada dienu pludmalē. Sadalījušies 2 komandās, barbabērni cīnās par smilšu pussalu.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad futbola laukumā sarodas trušu ģimene, Rabla komanda liek lietā prasmes un izdomā jaunu sportu - trušbolu!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz pūķītei Svītijai iemācīties lidot un atgriezties pie vecākiem Mākoņu alās. Kad Lielā Sarkanā Cāļa burvju triks liek Karalienei un Garnadzim samainīties vietām, Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz viņus pārvērst atpakaļ!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: No kalna izbēdzis āzis izraisa haosu, aprīdams visu, kas pagadās! Bali nekur nav atrodama, un Barbapapa liek lietā savu attapību, meklējot viņu. Viņi pat nenojauš, kāds pārsteigums viņus gaida.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbalala un ģimenes dzīve! Barbagudrais un Barbabo uzbūvē milzīgu koka rotaļlietu, ko darbina bio degviela.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad Ātrmeistars nozog Rabla komandas autobusu, ķepaiņiem tas jāatgūst, lai paspētu uz Sjerras Spīdošās koncertu. Celtnieklīcī ir lieliska diena pludmalei! Rabla komandai jābūvē glābēju tornis, lai pludmalē būtu aboslūti droši.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad ceļojošā veterinārārste daktere Diva nevar laikā veikt visu Celtnieklīcī dzīvojošo dzīvnieku apskati, Rabla komanda zina, kā jārīkojas. Lilijas nāriņu ballīte tiek atsaukta, kad sāk līt. Laiks celtniecības risinājumam!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pēc sniegota pārsteiguma pienākšanas, Rabla komanda piedāvā palīdzēt Hedlija viesnīcā. Kad kāpnes izrādās nepietiekami ātras, ir laiks celt. Karls adoptē kaķēnus. Kad viņi izraisa popkorna elli, Rabla komanda padara kafejnīcu kaķēniem draudzīgu.

Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabravo nīkst no garlaicības, jo brāļi un māsas ir aizņemti un negrib ar viņu spēlēties.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Barbapapa

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepai ir vējbakas, un viņai jāpaliek gultā, līdz kļūs labāk.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa kopā ar ģimeni dodas uz Vējaino pili. Kad viņi tur nonāk, viņi bauda skaisto skatu no augšas.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepas un Džordža māsīca Hloja ierodas ciemos. Pepa mēģina parādīt Hlojai, ka ir liela meitene, bet tas ir grūti.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Mamma cep pankūkas, Pepa un Džordžs palīdz, bet tētis tik augstu uzmet pankūkas, ka tās pielīp pie griestiem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Vecmāmiņa un vectētiņš pieskata Pepu un Džordžu, kamēr mamma un tētis uz vakaru dodas prom. Pepa un Džordžs ir pārāk sajūsmināti, lai gulētu, tāpēc vecvecāki spēlējas ar viņiem, lai nogurdinātu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa iet uz pirmo deju stundu un atrod draugus. Viņa nolemj mācīt mammai un tētim dejot, bet atklāj, ka viņiem ir savi deju soļi.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs rīko pikniku, kad sākas negaiss. Viņi ieiet iekšā, bet Pepai un Džordžam ir bail, jo negaiss rada lielu troksni.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs dodas pie vecvecākiem pusdienās. Vecmāmiņa pagatavojusi salātus, bet Džordžam negaršo dārzeņi, tāpēc vectēvs izveido no tiem dinozaurus, lai mudinātu Džordžu tos apēst.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš un Dora dodas uz Banānkalnu, lai nogādātu Isai dāvanu - Zābaciņa apgleznotu puķu podu! Dora kopā ar draugiem rīko dzimšanas dienas pārsteiguma ballīti Garnadzim. Ceļā uz svinībām Garnadzis mēģina nočiept pats savu dāvanu!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbalala un ģimenes dzīve! Barbagudrais un Barbabo uzbūvē milzīgu koka rotaļlietu, ko darbina bio degviela.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbamazuļi atrod ziloņu mazuli un slepeni par to rūpējas. Kā Barbatētis un Barbamamma reaģēs uz Borisu?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. programme.title: Danger Force

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: With only a few weeks left of summer, Lil has a genius idea: the family must visit her favorite theme park, Lake World, before Jack leaves! But when they arrive, its clearly less magical than Lil remembered: the fish dogs are droopy, the coaster aint coastin, the all-you-can-eat shrimp buffet is kaput. Jacks more interested in filming the janky park - frustrating Lil, who wants him to enjoy the day with his eyeballs. She consoles herself that the parks BEST ride will make up for the disappointing day. But when they get to where the ride should be, its gone! Devastated, Lil blames Jack for the horrid day, and they get in a bad fight. Back at the hotel that night, still mad at each other, the kids cant help but piece together clues hinting that the Otter Side might still be in the park... They have to find it! The kids must sneak past vengeful security guards and chaotic mazes to find the mythical ride, leading to an adventure neither of them expected.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: The school is looking for a new mascot, and Chloe and her new friends think they can make an impression by designing the winning entry. Chloe, Jinx, and Booch create a costume they are excited about, leaving it at the beach house until the they can present it at school. Meanwhile, Phoebe learns that Max has gotten them jobs at the school, but while he has a cushy Vice Principal job, she is the new Art teacher. Their argument over this leads to accidentally destroying it the new mascot costume. After Chloe discovers what theyve done and is furious with them, Max and Phoebe realize that being her guardian comes with more responsibility than they imagined.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Phoebe and Max unwittingly let Chloes friends watch a horror movie and eat candy, leaving them traumatized and craving more sugar. Jinx and Boochs parents want to meet with Chloes parents to discuss the lack of supervision at the beach house. With Hank and Barb away, Max and Phoebe are determined to prove they can be good guardians, and use a disguise gadget to transform into their parents to help Chloe. It goes well until the real Hank and Barb show up, and must transform into Max and Phoebe to keep the ruse going.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks hinges on David Seville, a single father whose everyday struggle is to bring up his kids, 3 chipmunks: Alvin- the oldest brother, the leader, not so good at school, Simon- the smartest of the three brothers, exemplary pupil and Theodore- the youngest one, the chubby one, the gentle one. David "Dave" sometimes loses his temper and then he is shouting "Alvinnnnn!!!". Music is an obligatory pleasant part of every episode. Every episode touches up-to-date issues of both adults and kids from modern life like real problems at school, dating and so on. Thanks to their own foolishness chipmunks often find themselves in ridiculous situations and have to use their creativity to get out of a mess, that provides us with a good opportunity to enjoy their joyful adventures.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.desc: Its election day and Bester finds herself running for President of the Book Club against her good friend Rocky. // When Best and Bester accidently list the Sub as a guest house, they receive a visitor who they simply must impress.

programme.title: Best and Bester

programme.desc: Bests sound effects threaten to derail Besters one chance to shine on the opening night of a Flip Flops play. // Best and Besters "inbestigation" into some missing golf balls escalates into a full-blown mountain rescue mission.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Not your average bunch of teenagers, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles have been expertly trained by their anthropomorphic rat sensei, Splinter, in the art of ninjutsu. Criminals of New York beware, beneath the streets of this concrete metropolis, Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello and Raphael are waiting to put their training into practice, battling evil forces within the city and restoring peace. From petty thieves, to evil overlords, to aliens of an unfamiliar kind, New York is safe in the hands of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles!

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig
programme.desc: This animated comedy show follows the outrageous and often gross-out antics of a enthusiastic and curious 12-year-old boy named Sanjay Patel and his best friend and a master of disguise, a talking snake named Craig. These two are match made in heaven as they find themselves in crazy and hilarious situations every day in their home town of Lundgren. They complete each other and together they are ready to face any challenges and difficulties that life has ahead for them.

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. SpongeBob SquarePants is a ten-year-old with a red cap, goofy and friendly as hes always been. Lets not forget SpongeBobs friends, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward, whos a bit older than the others and works as a junior counselor. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Watching too many ninja movies has brainwashed Leonard the koala. During the day, as he sleeps, he terrorizes everyone by sleepfighting (as opposed to sleepwalking). He makes the Rat King very angry by beating and humiliating him, and the oversized rodent is out for revenge. The penguins counter-program Leonard with a Lunacorn love movie marathon - is it enough to conquer all? // Private is left to babysit four adorable ducklings as the rest of the gang tries to crash a monster truck rally (unsuccessfully). The ducklings are a rowdy bunch and throw a party, inadvertently attracting party-crashing rats and wasps who attack the party food. Private and the ducklings become trapped in the lair with the food, and as the rats and wasps try to break in, Private must think fast - how can he combat both gangs at once?

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The penguins notice its been quiet at night. Too quiet, somethings amiss. The rest of the zoo animals have been sneaking out at night to spend time partying in the park! The plan to sneak out then return by morning to avoid getting caught by Alice is put in jeopardy when they run into the classic New York problem - a traffic jam in the tunnel. How in the world can a traffic jam get cleared out of the tunnel in time? // The penguins make a new friend in Dode the dodo bird, who they clone back into existence after a pesky bout of extinction. Having grown up with no natural enemies, Dode has no fear and it leads him to daredevilish behavior - the kind that can make you extinct over and over again. The penguins dont want to see this keep happening to their friend, they need to find a way to slow this crazy bird down!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness
programme.desc: Po the Panda trains, battles, learns, teaches, stumbles, gabs and ""geeks out"" as the newest hero in the Valley of Peace. Now living in his permanent home at the Jade Palace with the rest of the Furious Five, Po will have to take on new responsibilities and face brand-new adversaries (not seen in the movies) in his continuing education as the Dragon Warrior...for being the Dragon Warrior is not a destination, its a journey (unfortunately for Po, that journey is uphill).

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Aang feels neglected as Katara and Sokka reunite with Bato, an old friend of their fathers from the South Pole. They begin to reminisce on their times in the past while they wait for a message to arrive from their father; in which Aang believes Katara and Sokka will abandon him and go out to find their father should the message arrive. However, when the messenger gives Aang the message to give to Bato, Aang betrays his friends in a way Katara or Sokka could never imagine. However, when Zuko recruits a bounty hunter named June to track Aang down. His friendship is put to the test, as he must deal with the fact that he betrayed his friends while defending himself from yet another fight.

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: When an anonymous monster praises Toraleis poetry online, shes determined to find out whos behind the account. // Finnegans excited to earn a magical trident upgrade, but he scrambles to fix things when his trident breaks instead.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: When Best breaks the last clean plate, rather than do the dishes, Best and Bester head out to buy a brand new one. // Best and Bester decide to make the best milkshake ever, only to find themselves in a bitter contest with Flip Flop.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best wins a competition to pitch his story ideas to world famous author A N Other, and finds that threes a crowd. // Best and Bester housesit for Diamondo and realise that theres more to it than massage chairs and unlimited snacks.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Bettervale is celebrating "Better Day" but Best and Bester manage to anger the townsfolk by causing mischief again. // After a period of exile Best and Bester return hoping to patch things up with their neighbours and with each other.

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale
programme.desc: The hamsters try to compete with popular animal videos online and end up going viral. // Mondo must choose between his new superpower (causing thunderstorms) and his friend.

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: It is pure luck to have a genie to fulfill all wishes, to have two of them is something incredible. Leah is a little girl with a genie bottle necklace, which includes Shimmer and Shine, genie twins. Shimmer is a genie with blue eyes and pink hair, encouraging and passionate, she has a pet, a gibbon monkey Tala. Shine is her twin genie with purple eyes and blue hair, big animal lover. Her pet is a little Bengal tiger Nahal. Zac is Leahs neighbor with red hair and blue eyes, and her best human friend. Leah is making three wishes every day, genies are doing their best but the results are far from perfect, as genies are very young and unskilled. This is the source of awkward and comic situations, but in the end girls manage to get over all difficulties.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets
programme.desc: Rusty Rivets is a fantastic and picturesque animated series about Rusty who lives in Sparkton Hills along with his friend Ruby Ramirez, a robotic tyrannosaurid named Botasaur, and a group of smaller robots known as the Bits. Rusty is a smart inventor and a little genius who with the help of his amazing discoveries helps his friends out of difficulties. Rusty constructs robots of different sizes, forms and purposes, he is in love with science, technology and engineering. Together with his friend Ruby they can repair any old machinery and out-of-date equipment. Their splendid intellect arouses envy and toxic rivals do not play the game clean.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Kowalskis obsession with Doris the dolphin drives him to invent a love ray, the Love-U-Laser. It works like a charm until Alice falls for a trashcan, Julien falls for Mort, and Skipper orders the ray to be put in reverse. Private gets hit by the reverse ray and instantly loathes Kowalski. Matters get much worse as the loathe ray explodes and everybody hates Kowalski! Hes only got one shot to stop being the most loathed penguin in the world. // Told as a courtroom flashback, Kowalski unwisely revives Jiggles in a small, whipped cream-eating version. The little green cubes multiply on impact, however, and are soon threatening to cover the surface of the earth. As the Jiggli multiply out of control, will the team be able to prevent the jiggli-fication of the world?

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Littlefoot: Marlene is dying to go see a concert in the park. But, every time she leaves the zoo she becomes a feral monster! Kowalski comes to the rescue with his invention the Persona-Disentangleizer, which separates her savage nature from her regular self. The savage Marlene escapes and rampages through the city. Can the Penguins stop her before she destroys the city? Smotherly Love: Ma, an empty-nested mother possum, takes up residence in the Penguins Lair after they destroy her home during a battle with Hans the Puffin. She smothers the penguins with love and nurturing, and gets her new boys to behave by playing possum whenever necessary. The battle-hardened unit devolves into a bunch of softies, opening the door for Hans to take advantage. It looks like he has the upper wing, unless someone can make a play to stop him!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness
programme.desc: Po the Panda trains, battles, learns, teaches, stumbles, gabs and ""geeks out"" as the newest hero in the Valley of Peace. Now living in his permanent home at the Jade Palace with the rest of the Furious Five, Po will have to take on new responsibilities and face brand-new adversaries (not seen in the movies) in his continuing education as the Dragon Warrior...for being the Dragon Warrior is not a destination, its a journey (unfortunately for Po, that journey is uphill).

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: When Aang and his friends go to a Fire Nation town so that Aang can witness some firebending, their plan soon goes awry when its discovered that he is the Avatar. Fortunately, hes rescued by an individual who serves a firebending master named Jeong Jeong who has abandoned the Fire Nation, so Aang attempts to use this time to attempt to learn how to firebend. However, when the firebending master refuses to even see Aang, will Aang be able to prove hes ready to learn how to firebend despite the fact that he lacks discipline?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: Transformers: Earthspark
programme.desc: Robby backs out of Alexs traditional Wakwak hunt, so Alex shares his family history with Bumblebee, while Twitch, eager to gain her own traditions, encounters "Dad2" - Wheeljack.

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Frankie, Phoenix, and Heath search Hadess underworld factory for their missing friends and discover a surprising culprit. // Frankie and friends must "weave their own webs" and battle a foe to save the Monster Fest.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: The twins take a cactus called Pricklebutt to the beach and end up mounting a dramatic search and rescue mission. // Best and Bester wont let Grumpy Pants round of golf stop them from catching the finale of their favourite show.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Its Best to the rescue when Besters phobia of camels threatens to de-rail her chances of being dance champ. // Best and Bester go busking, but will Best cope with competition and what happens when burgers and banjos collide?

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Bester finds that the only way to get her brothers attention when hes glued to the game, is to be in the game. // Best and Bester stage a crazy publicity stunt for Grafifis repair shop which has everyone fearing for their lives.

programme.title: Harvey Beaks
programme.desc: Welcome to the peck-uliar world of Harvey Beak, a moderately mellow young bird who flies around his magical forest home of Littlebark Grove, with best-bird friends Fee and Foo, a pair of boisterous twins. The three feathered friends are always looking for new things to do, zooming around the forest embarking on adventures. With many other animals living in the forest, theres plenty of new characters and creatures for the trio to meet, often involving them on their mischievous escapades. Harvey lives with his parents, Irving Beaks and Miriam Beaks.

programme.title: Wallykazam!
programme.desc: Wallykazam! is about the adventures of Wally Trollman and his pet dragon, Norville. Wally has a magic stick that makes words come to life; each story has a new set of magic words, and Wally uses these words to playfully transform the world around him.

programme.title: Winx Club
programme.desc: Meet Bloom, a girl from Earth, who after she finds out that she is a fairy joins Alfea College on the planet Magix- a magical universe that is inhabited by fairies, witches and other mythical creatures. At Alfea College, fairy warriors from all over the universe study to improve their supernatural powers and here Bloom befriends five other fairies - Stella, the fairy of the Sun, Flora, the fairy of nature, Tecna, the fairy of technology, Musa, the fairy of music and Aisha, the fairy of waves. Together, this group of girls known as the Winx, become best friends and the force to be reckoned with as they experience incredible adventures while defending their universe from varous enemies.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.
